name: Gadget
title: gadget.dev
shortDescription: Gadget simplifies the development of full-stack web applications by providing a suite of integrated tools that handle backend, frontend, and database management. It is designed for developers aiming to increase productivity and reduce time-to-market. Example use case: A developer can use Gadget to quickly build and deploy an e-commerce application, integrating custom APIs and managing data with ease.
pros: Rapid development with no SQL or schema migrations
Built-in support for serverless API and real-time updates
Fully hosted with automatic scaling and maintenance
cons: Limited customization compared to traditional stacks
Dependence on a single provider for all components
Potential for higher costs at scale

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Firebase
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers real-time databases and backend services

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Heroku
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Easy to use platform for deploying web apps
